metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5701 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
setup/frames/index.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.10.x before 4.0.10.16,4.4.15.x before 4.4.15.7, and 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remote attackers toconduct BBCode injection attacks against HTTP sessions via a crafted URI.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5701` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
